Text: The Constitutional Court of the Republic of Lithuania (in Lithuanian: "Lietuvos Respublikos Konstitucinis Teismas" ) is a special court established by the Constitution of the Republic of Lithuania of 1992; it began the activities after the adoption of the Law on Constitutional Court of the Republic of Lithuania on February 3, 1993.
Triplets:<The Constitutional Court of the Republic of Lithuania
1:
--------------------
<Text: Constitutional Court of Lithuania:  Since its inception, the Court has been located in the city of Vilnius, Gediminas Avenue.>
